Title: My Stay at the Westin
Great Stay in the Heart of Atlanta
Wonderful trip
Very nice hotwl
NEEDS SOME UPDATING
Review: The staff was great.   The food was tasty.    The only issue is the sound transmission under the door.   Really needs to be addressed.  Too much noise from folks talking, etc. in the halls.  Maybe add a door sweep.

I want to start my review by saying that it is rare to go to a hotel where every single staff member is friendly and genuine. This was definitely the case at the Westin Peachtree Plaza.  Whether it was in the elevator, at the registration...

We absolutely loved our stay.  We were on the 59th floor and had an amazing view, day and night.   The room was very clean and very nice.  Everyone we encountered was very nice and attentive.   We declined housekeeping to save environmentally.  We loved our stay...

Room was spacious and clean, probably one of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever slept on. Shower was a walk-in and I enjoyed the rain style shower head and the hand held. Gym was clean and had lots of equipment. Front desk employees were incredibly...

All in all very pleasant, but the hotel felt dated. Exquisite views.  Restaurant was Delicious, but expensive. The bar 210 was expensive and light on the pour. Signature drinks upstairs were way too sweet.

Title: Great weekend
Absolutely wonderful hotel
The staff is very good.
Awesome Hotel
Love it.
Review: Had an amazing weekend staying here. Centrally located in downtown Atlanta so it made it easy to walk to most attractions and venues. With the addition of the streetcars that run through Atlanta, it was no problem getting to different places.

This is a beautiful, updated property. The room was nicely appointed and clean with magnificent views. The staff is superbly professional and friendly. This hotel is in a great location! We were able to walk to our concert, no problem. We will stay there again...

Though there was a screw up with my reservation which resulted in a very unpleasant experience at 1 am in the morning, however, the staff at the hotel is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING. The person dealing with me at 1 am was a duty manager called Salli...

The room was immaculate. The bed was super comfortable. The views from our room were spectacular. Everyone from the Valets to the Concierge were extremely friendly and helpful. Will definitely stay here again.

We loved this Hotel. The ambience, the location and the service. From front desk, maid service to Valet. Excellent service. We stayed in this Hotel for our Honeymoon. We were young people at the time and could only stay one night so 34 years later...

Review: The bar is absolutely fantastic. Brian from Columbia was cool as hell. All the bartenders were actually. My coworker and I had a great stay and great accommodations. The drinks are a little expensive but worth the value.

I always enjoy staying at this hotel.  The luggage stewards are always helpful and after 20+ years of staying at this hotel I know many of them by name.  Eddie and Jose are two of my favs.  Alvin takes good care of my car.  I...

I recently stayed here as part of a business convention and was pleasantly surprised. The hotel is very clean and neat and the views of the city are awesome. Price is a little steep but overall it was a great stay. I went up to...

I really enjoyed my night there.  The view was breathtaking, loved going up to 72nd floor and see the view.  I ate at the Sundial, the food was really good, view was amazing.  Everyone was friendly, room was clean, bed was really comfortable.  I will...

My boyfriend originally came down to Atlanta for his birthday. We had Hyatt Place reserved until we pulled up and it was a dump. We stumbled up to Westin and the stay was great from outstanding customer service to food. Thanks, we will be back...

After leaving another hotel unexpectedly we chose to give Westin a try. Erica at check-in was very friendly and even asked my son what floor he would like to stay on. He picked 63 which was perfect. The room was great, loved the lavender roll-on...

Actual rating is 4.5/5. Excellent spaces in lobby areas to relax, catch up on emails, or network w friends/co-workers. Sun Dial Restaurant/Bar on 72nd floor was great...nice panoramic views of Atlanta (on a clear day). Location great! Workout facility nice. Overall excellent stay (need hot...

Arrived in time to watch the sun set from the bar and the 360 views were incredible across Atalanta city

Excellent hotel. Staff was helpful, courteous and friendly. Registration was very quick. Room is clean and has everything you need for a hotel room. Bed was super comfortable. Has a bar with decent food and a star bucks as well. Within walking distance to lots...

Atlanta
great stay at the Peachtree

Review: The Hotel is absolutely beautiful. The view from the rooms are Amazing. The gym was huge and the swimming pool was gorgeous. My family really enjoyed this Hotel. I would highly recommend and hope to stay again soon.

I'm old enough to remember when the hotel was built.  I've stayed here before - a while back.  I continue to marvel at the engineering that put this together.
The staff were all very friendly.  The bed was very comfortable.  The views from the 55th...

Another great Westin hotel. Service was excellent. Great bar. Easy access from Marta. The service for our business meeting was outstanding. Breakfast was good but lunch was better. Healthy good choices for this.

All the hotel staff i interacted with were very friendly. The  staff always courteous and genuinely wanted to make my stay a great one. . Love the location  and the bed was heavenly. Room service was fast and the food was very good.

This Westin is a good location however the rooms are dated and the bathroom is almost unmanageable for two people.  The staff is nice but over the weekend there is a high presence of partiers.  From people passed out in the lobby to continual noise...

My husband and I were town to visit our daughter, a college student in Atlanta, and to celebrate our anniversary. Check-in was most pleasant and we were surprised with an anniversary treat that was delivered to our room! Bellmen were very helpful and provided quick...

We held a family birthday event here. The room was large and spacious. The sleek modern design was very professional and the shower was heavenly. The staff were professional, courteous and very helpful. We loved staying here and will be recommending this establishment to others...

I stayed here for an event at the convention center.  It's a nice place for getting work done.  The decor is somewhat bland, but not dated.  The shower pressure was fantastic.  The bar on the top floor has spectacular views and a really good lobster...

Chelsea is absolutely amazing! She provided some of the BEST customer service  I’ve seen in a looong time! She made sure my birthday trip and my stay at the Westin was one to remember! I can’t wait to visit again!

Stayed at the Westin for two nights Thursday thu Saturday with my family of four based on the proximity to the Aquarium and other attractions. Had my high school prom here 30 years ago so always wanted to stay. Based on Atlanta hotels and the...

Outstanding view, services and comfort. In Atlanta for business.  Opted not to stay at Conference hotel because we are Marriott members.  Westin was 3 blocks from conference, right downtown close to restaurants other conveniences.  Would stay at Westin again, no question, if business brings me...

Stayed at Westin Peachtree plaza for 3 nights during my participation in a conference. The hotel is nice and I really enjoyed my stay. They, however, charged me 33 dollars extra than the amount showed on my invoice. Contacted them through their facebook account and...

We stay at a Westin property whenever possible.  This particular hotel was extremely clean, the room had a fantastic view and was recently updated. Our room was located on the 46th floor. We had drinks at the open bar and watched part of the UGA...

Rooms are small due to round shape of the hotel.  The elevators can be heard in your room and if your high up it can take 5 min to get down.  The sidewalk has a homeless problem and they are very aggressive

Heater was broke, lamp in room was broke, double charged on credit card. Charged 30 for renting a movie some how. Was supose to be upgradded to a suite amd instead of my children being able to sleep on a bed we were up graded...

What a colossal dump. Room is old and tired. Bathtub is grimy and has rust.

Furniture has dirt streaks all over. The base of the lamp has food stains and fingerprints from the past 10 years probably. How is this place getting stellar reviews?

We enjoyed our weekend in the city at the Westin. The staff was very accommodating and went above and beyond for our anniversary. We had beautiful view of the city from our room and the room its self was spacious and extremely clean.

I would like to speak with the GM.  Not anyone rlse.  I asked the front desk supervisor to have the GM call 2 days ago and have not heard a word.  I did speak briefly with sundial manager and she said she would call me...

Review: Southern hospitality was an understatement during my stay at the Westin Peachtree. Every single staff member was friendly, polite and helpful no matter the time of day or situation. They always said hello and had a smile on their face. The hotel was clean and...

Incredible service. Starting from the front desk staff. Mr. Shamel Stanley treated me like I was the one guest in the hotel that week!! Answered all question completely and efficiently! He made the first impression everlasting! I had an amazing room (54th Floor) with breath-taking...

I was really expecting more, the hotel is nice but nothing above average (especially for a 4-star hotel and the cost per night). Staff was not polite! For three times I have questions and they were almost rude!

It was not allowed to check-in even after 5pm (It should be at 3pm). The reason given was that the room was not ready although the check-out time is 12pm. For two guests, the supplies for coffee/tea were just enough for one guest.

Loved the location, almost stole the luxurious robe:), the receptionists abd all personnel were extremely welcoming, attentive and accommodating, just did not like the elevators with confusing enrries and multiple, never ending stops. Wish that the pool was easier to get to.

It seems this time when I went through the check in process, the level of service was not as good as two weeks ago.  Also I had a drink in the Sundial Bar which I must say is nothing like it was in it's hey...

Typical Westin experience, close to 70 odd floors. Extremely busy all the time as they have multiple conferences etc.
After waiting for almost 15 minutes for an elevator and when arrived to my room with some boxed dinner, the card wont work, had to go...

Hotel was great and I'm good area close to everything but parking to park yourself is $35/day. That's not even valet! Then they charge you $3 every 20 minutes you're over checkout. It cost me $56 to park for one day stay!!!! This is ridiculous.

Beautiful hotel, awesome rooms, friendly staff, and great location. Wish I had a longer business trip. Beds were so comfortable. I would have liked to stay in my room longer. Keep up the good work....

Title: Well located; helpful staff
Westin Peachtree Plaza
Room with a View!
Beautiful hotel but that’s it
Great Location
Review:
I stayed here for a week for a company event.  It is well located--near MARTA and within walking distance of sites, attractions, and good restaurants.  The hotel was easy to navigate and the staff friendly and helpful.

A very "Westin" experience.  :)

Unfortunately I was not too impressed with this hotel.  I found my room to be in need of a refurbishment; carpets, walls, furniture dated and tired.  The room was also not cleaned to a high standard; carpets needed hoovering and coffee machine was unclean.  There...

The Westin Peachtree Plaza was an excellent choice for our trip to a concert in Atlanta.  It was located within walking distance to Peachtree Plaza, Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Centennial Olympic Park, SkyView Atlanta, and many restaurants.  Our room was very clean and had an amazing view...

The hotel is beautiful with great views, that’s the only pro. Half the staff were completely unhelpful, parking is outrageously expensive (even for downtown Atlanta) and no one from housekeeping touched our room for three days. Save your money and go elsewhere. I will never...

The hotel and staff were very friendly and accommodating. I experienced no issues during my stay, the room was comfortable and the food in the restaurant was top notch. I would return here. Just be prepared to pay a great deal for parking.

Upon arrival and check-in we were greeted nicely, but upon entering our room we found a half eaten can of nuts on the night stand with trash/debris under it. , the sheets were a mess and the bed not properly made. Also the toiletries in...

Had a wonderful experience here. Staff was beyond friendly and helpful. Rooms were nice. Elevators were a bit annoying with the numbering system and ones that go to different levels. Overall such a great hotel.

I stayed at the Westin while attending a conference. The rooms were a good size and well furnished. The only shortcoming was that there wee too few drawers to hold all my clothing. There were enough elevators that I could get to and from my...

Downtown hotel in an iconic cylindrical skyscraper. The hotel is not brand new but well kept. USB charging ports have been added by the bed. Wifi works well and is reasonably speedy. Rooms have floor to ceiling windows. Bed is comfortable with plenty of pillows....

Beautiful hotel in the center of Atlanta. Easily located about a mile off the interstate. Everyone friendly and helpful. I was there for a meeting - meeting areas were good. The rooms are comfortable and clean. Food is good but quite expensive.

Giving a good rate for facilities while giving low points for poor treatment from a staff. It was a very bad moment facing unkind face which makes a customer to reconsider to come back to this hotel...

This was a standard hotel in the Westin Collection. I did like the floor to ceiling windows with cool views of downtown Atlanta and outlying neighborhoods. Pretty busy place with weird elevator arrangements though. 

Gym is really big and nice! Definitely appreciated that. Especially since...

I have always thought of the Westin property as top notch the team failed me this time around valet was a 20 min wait mixup of keys and I felt discriminated at the sundial I brought my fiancé there to give he an engagement ring...

Review: I am platinum elite member, i was thinking i will get good service. But this hotel's service sucks. Whole week they have not refreshed / replace shampoo conditioner and lotion. I was not expecting this.

The rooms are on the small side and service is about average.  I had an issue with not having a concierge room and there was no compensation offered.  I would stay at the Marriott Marquis.  Better service all around.

There are so many reasons to love this property - Starbucks in the lobby- Views from up to 72 floors up- and of course locations.  We had a top five list of things we wanted to do and this property was less than two miles...

It is always a pleasure to stay at the Westin Atlanta. I feel like a king whenever I visit Atlanta. The staff are friendly and professional. The cleaning staff are hard working. The location on Peachtree is ideal and everyone knows where it's at.

This is my favorite property in Atlanta. I can drive in, leave my car, walk across the bridge to market, and walk right back when the day is done. I can even eat all of my meals here. My feet never have to touch asphalt...

Review: Overall, my stay was great. The staff was wonderful to speak with, and everyone was very friendly. I am not a member of Westin, but was offered points or a voucher to forego cleaning service while I was there. I chose the vouchers, but was...

The staff, and room were great, however a beeping noise, or low tone disrupted my sleep on several occasions.In the morning I could hear the tome in the hallway, and reported it to the front desk when I checked out.

Friendly and courteous staff.  Walking distance to College Football Hall of fame and great restaurants close by.  Will definitely stay here again.  20 minutes from airport and about 30 minutes from Sun Trust Park.

Westin is such a great place to stay, not only awesome facilities they did such a great job with the conference I was at. Would highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in downtown Atlanta!!

We enjoyed our stay. The only frustrating thing was the bar didn’t open till4 and the cafe in the hotel didn’t open back up after breakfast till 4 as well. So you had to leave the hotel to get food. Other then that it’s a...

Title: Beautiful, clean & friendly
Overall decent stay
Enjoyed!
Poor service & rude staff
A jewel in the heart of Atlanta
Review: In the heart of the City within walking distance to a CVS and a Walgreens, several restaurants and we were treated very well by the staff! A quick Uber or Taxi to shopping districts. The room was spacious and clean. Starbucks in the lobby was...

The hotel was massive, lots of different amenities for the guests. Restaurant options and food was pretty limited, parking was too expensive. Rooms are nice but pretty typical of other hotels. The room could have been dusted.

Check in staff was very quick and friendly.  The location of the hotel is in the heart of peachtree making easy access for local attractions. Valet was $45 which is a bit much. Hotel staff is awesome ..

The elevators at this location are confusing.  it was completely inappropriate for an employee to yell at me after he passed me that i needed to watch all of the elevator doors.  In addition, one day our room was never cleaned and the following day...

The Westin Peachtree Plaza in Atlanta is conveniently located to many of the cities attractions, very accessible (especially to the MARTA), and provides an overall high-quality experience.  The rooms, services and amenities are top quality.

Review: This is our 4th stay at this hotel. I booked and paid for the hotel on Priceline. After checking in and giving my credit card to them to hold for incidentals I woke up the next day to an additional 2 nights charged to my...

Went there for a meeting, had dinner at the top floor restaurant, food was good, as was a service.  The rooms have grade views, however, the infrastructure is a bit antiquated. The friend valet area is not very friendly for dropping off and picking up...

I really enjoyed my stay there.  The views were really nice and I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  The only things I did not like was that there was no microwave and you could only have a refridgerator if you paid to turn...

Overall I had a great stay at the Westin. I found the staff and the accommodations to be top notch. The only issue that I had was with the wireless. It was extremely slow and I defaulted to my cell phone as a hot spot.

Excellent service and nice people. The valet service with the cars were extremely helpful. Everyone was very helpful and friendly. The conference food for the NAFTZ was very good. It is hard to feed so many people and it come out with flavor and warm....

ROOM:  My personal opinion.  Mattress was hard.  Sheets like sandpaper.  Pillows awesome. Air conditioning icy!  "Chiller"...

Review: I had a wonderful experience while staying there.  The room was perfect and there it had the best view in all of Atlanta! The service was impeccable as well! I will definitely recommend the Westin to all of my friends and family.

Perfect venue for a meeting. Excellent clean rooms. Nice views, excellent conference space. Beautiful restaurant at top of hotel with great food and amazing views. Bed was very comfortable and shower was rain shower and worked well. Staff is excellent and very helpful. Great location...

So my girl friend and I stayed here as we were attending the One Music Fest.  This was my first experience at a Westin Hotel.  The ambience was great.  The lady who checked us in (can't remember her name) was a doll! Very professional!  She...

Lifetime Platinum Premier Elite in the new world order and checked in to this hotel to beautiful view room on 60th floor to be told by staff if i want to charge my phone or laptop I would need to go to the bathroom or...

This is a superb hotel in a downtown Atlanta.  Very nice accommodations and courteous agents.  Good restaurants.  Great views of the city from the restaurant on the top of this hotel.  One block away from The subway station and multiple restaurants.

This is a typical large convention hotel located in center city Atlanta.  Given the location there is limited shopping around and downtown Atlanta leaves something to be desired.  That said, the hotel is a few minutes from MARTA so you can get around the city...

Although centrally located, if I ever need to return back to Atlanta in the future, I would probably prefer to stay at the Ritz Carlton across the street, which also belongs to the Marriott/SPG group. This hotel offered nothing special for elite members except free...

service and amiability at front desk was excellent, just reported a minumm detail about cleaning and the response was immediate by e mail caring about my issues, despite it was not solved. i had a fantastic view and slept wonderful

Stayed here this week as part of a conference that was in town.  I had several hotels I could choose from, but selected this property as I am platinum status with Starwood/Marriott and usually have good experiences with this brand.

Review: We had a king room for Dragoncon this year and our stay was excellent! This was our second year staying at the Westin and everyone was extremely helpful and courteous, and check in/out was a breeze! The beds are incredibly comfortable, and the rooms are...

This hotel is fantastic in every way.  The #1 pizzeria ( Amalfi) in Atlanta is steps away from hotel. The gym is the best that I have ever seen in any hotel, they have every weightlifting machine. The staff is excellent.

I was pleasantly surprised by the way the Westin handled an issue that was beyond the control of both the Westin and myself. All personnel of the Westin kept apologizing for the mistake that was beyond everyone’s control. I was comp’d a appetizer while I...

Paid extra for a higher room, worth it.  Room service food too high prices.  Don't order delivery from other locations, they can't access room and it's hard to find them in lobby.  Recommend eating nearby, great restaurants.

Weekend Gateaway
Great View!
Review: Very nice, spacey, rather quiet. Nice staff. Luggage on escalator :-( as elevators from level 4 entrance were unavailable because of busy hotel workers. Well, we managed  :-)! Here for DragonCon 2018 and we hope to be back :-)

From the moment you arrive you are received with smiles and kindness, they take the customer service and customer experience seriously here, I chose this hotel for the location , walking distance to the Coca Cola or the aquarium as well as many landmarks downtown,...

We only stayed one night but our front desk assistant was excellent in every way. Very helpful. Lakesha is her name and she set the bar high for the rest of our stay, we were very pleased with the hotel.

Went to visit my husband in GA who is currently station for work, we stayed at the Westin hotel for the weekend and everyone was very helpful and very nice. From the valet to the person who checked us in. The person in the front...

We stayed here for the night on a business trip and the view was fantastic. The beds were comfortable and the service was friendly. The young man at the front desk was so kind and helpful. This hotel is in a great location. Near everything.

Review: Starwood Gold Member.  Greeted by manager Andy Ramirez at check-in.  Reserved room for honeymoon about a month ago. Entire staff did a great job all the way from the front desk to the valet service.  Late check-out was a bonus.  Will be back!

We stayed at thecWestin for Dragon Con. Unfortunately everything is expensive not just the Westin but I did like that they gave me a choice if I wanted room service if you chose to not have it they give you a 5 dollar voucher for...

I travel at least 50% of the year for work.... i'm starting to think SPG properties period have just fallen off completely as a whole as i'm currently on tour & experienced THEE EXACT same thing in the last city (Le Meridien Philly). Long story...

As with previous years, we have enjoy staying at the Westin Peachtree Plaza during Dragon*Con; inside cafe/bar, Starbucks, tunnels to the AmeriMark buildings, and express elevators make it a vary pleasurable experience.

Title: Labor Day weekend vacation
Westin Peachtree Dragon Con 2018
Dragoncon stay
High-Rise Happiness
DragonCon 2018
Review: Check-in on Wednesday afternoon was quick and easy.  Our room was immediately available.  Lobby was large, open, spacious, and very tidy.  Room was on a high floor, clean and neat on arrival.  We had some confusion about the "cooling unit" (not a room refrigerator,) sign...

We came for Dragon Con. Hotel is positioned perfectly for our situation. Parking was $45 a night, which is outrageous. The staff was excellent! Checking in and out was a breeze. Elevators were not a problem as in years past. I would recommend this hotel...

A great deal for Dragoncon, far enough away from the madness but still a part of it.  Overpriced drinks but that's true at all the hotels. Starbucks was efficient and the line moved well. Elevators worked and were fine up to Monday morning, which is...

Even in the midst of Dragon Con, the Westin staff managed to stay on top of *everything* with cool reserve and high-quality customer service. I was on the 59th floor and that view will stay with me forever, as well as the smiling, helpful faces...

Always appreciate the Westin Peachtree Plaza during DragonCon. Despite there being a ton of people, they always manage to staff appropriately. I never have to wait to ask a question at the desk. There is always staff around to assist. All very helpful and polite....

Review: My wife and I stayed to the Westin Peachtree Plaza during the 2018 Dragon Con convention.  And, despite being a convention for the "weirdos and crazies," the hotel underpromised and overdelivered.  I had four wonderful nights worth of sleep (and yes, I did sleep).  The...

Friendly and attentive staff, attractive building and rooms, and convenient location. The restaurants provided excellent service. Overall, I highly recommend the Westin Peachtree Plaza and choose it first when traveling to downtown Atlanta.

1st time at the Westin for DCON 2018. Booked a room for 4 days. 18th floor, double queen, 4 adults. Will gladly stay here again. Only issue was Bar210. A 12oz draft beer and an 8oz glass of Pinot - $19.60. Staff - 5 star,...

This hotel has been a nightmare! You would think reserving a room in April before your August stay would guarantee you a room, right? Wrong. Our room was booked in April. We also called and requested an early check in as well. We traveled 2...
